text: Saint-Léger-lès-Domart (pronounced "sɛ̃ leʒe lɛ dɔmaʁ", also known as Saint- Ngé-lès-Donmart in local Picard dialect) is a commune in the Somme department in Hauts-de-France in northern France. == Geography == The commune is about northwest of Amiens, on the D12 road. == Population == ==Related pages== *Communes of the Somme department ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Communes in Somme
title: Saint-Léger-lès-Domart
